website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, feature-packed fan. Minor annoyances don't deflect from this model's conveniences and performance.
pros: This basic fan offers a surprising feature set considering the reasonable price: auto shutoff timer, adjustable base, easy setup, fairly quiet operation with decent airflow
cons: Makes an annoying beeping noise when changing the fan setting
LED control panel display is quite bright in dark rooms
Feels less durable than higher-priced fans

customer_reviews.title: I bought this fan from Target. One of the ...
customer_reviews.text: On assembly I noticed that one of the four bolts holding the motor together had fallen out and I had to take it apart to fix it. But now four months later it is dying. I have to take the grill off and spin the blades to get it going. I can't see it lasting more than a couple of weeks. Should be enough time to get. I won't be buying Honeywell again.
customer_reviews.author: David Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Honeywell, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty straight forward and took less than 10 minutes. . It works fine and I do like the 5 speed. . Even using it for the first time, I found it strange that the cover was warm from the motor or motor heat. . After about 32 days and used less than 10 times, the motor stopped spinning but the lights and sounds still worked. The cover this time was hot. Don't trust this fan and choose another brand. I bought the Westpointe pedestal fan and exhibited little heat on the cover even after 10 hours of constant on but it only has 3 speed settings, no timer and no remote.
customer_reviews.author: white cloud

customer_reviews.title: Dead After 2 Summers
customer_reviews.text: Mostly used only during the summer months and a few stuffy days hear and there in the Sporing. Bought this in April 2017. Thought it was a decent buy until April 2019 when on a stuffy night I plugged it in and the blades slowly made 3 circuits and died. At this price point I wasn't expecting a Forever Fan, but I had a reasonable expectation that it would outlast and outperform the $25 cheapie I picked up 5 years ago in a discount 'bargain store' and use in the laundry room. This thing was a poor buy and IS a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Electronic Controls Fail Before the Motor. Junk.
customer_reviews.text: The fan worked fine for the duration of the warranted period. After that it started having issues with the electronic controls. The fan would be sitting there, acting as if someone is clicking speed setting on the remote control. I re-soldered IR sensor from timer circuit to the speed circuit and it cured the issue for a while. Now it’s back to changing speed on its own, so the IR components that they use don’t last. I might rig it with just a regular switch and some sort of speed control, because the motor still runs fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene S

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan, Nice remote, easy assembly - Dead in 1 year, what a joke
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly great fan but who cares if it dies in less than a year use, I have 20 year old fans that still run well. I am sorely disappointed in this fan's performance life and it did not push air like similar fans I have owned in past. Loved the remote, settings, oscillation but who cares - it didn't last two summer seasons. Run away!!! Only doing this review to buy replacement pedestal fan and never again Honeywell.. It does operate quietly, but also isn't as strong as fans I had in past. I believe those who say it is super quiet, like me, have a dead machine that doesn't operate.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it was.
customer_reviews.text: General Notes: I am, overall, very happy with the purchase. Mine lasted about 2 years before motor started gumming up. Applying WD-40 helped it run for about another 6 months until it gave up completely. Liked: Lowest couple of settings are pleasantly quiet, it was outstanding. Easy to assemble and disassemble without instructions or tools. Never had to replace the remote batteries in the 2.5 years it functioned. Did not like: The piercing blue light others have mentioned. Lack of oscillation controls on the remote (have to use the tab on the fan itself).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cheong

customer_reviews.title: Bright and noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: The fan has completely stopped working and we are sending it back to the company for a replacement. The fan oscillates and actually works. However, the light is SO bright, the beeping noise it makes when you press buttons to adjust the speed is SO loud, and it rattles. Out of all of this, the rattling is the worst. The outer components surrounding the fan blades are metal and you have attach the front face via metal clamps. No matter what we do, it rattles due to the motion and an insecure fit.
customer_reviews.author: SZappone

customer_reviews.title: A breeze to assemble, and wonderfully quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Ten months later, I am still a fan of this fan. In fact, I'm going to buy another one, for the bedroom Most easy-to-follow assembly instructions I've ever encountered: clear diagrams and instructions in standard English. I'm usually all thumbs but got the fan to run in just a few minutes. It is wonderfully quiet. I have it in my small office and on the lowest speed it does a fine job of cooling the room. I was going to purchase a fan at three times the price but am happy with this inexpensive one. The white model is also reasonably attractive. However, it remains to be seen if this fan will still run well a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Astraea

customer_reviews.title: I read a lot of reviews before buying this fan, and it did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this fan, and it did not disappoint! It's much quieter than other stand fans I have owned, yet it still pushes out air very well. As others have stated, the light is a little too bright and the beep is a little too loud, but that those two problems are not bad enough for me to rate this below 5 stars. Update: I like this fan so much, I just purchased 2 more so I'll have them around my house during the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Fan at all speeds
customer_reviews.text: I received this fan and it was pretty easy to put together. I had trouble putting on the grill and getting the height adjusted. The fan is light enough to move around. The remote is great I used it to turn off the fan.The fan was great at all speeds and stayed put whereever it was placed. The fan helped to keep my electric down as I barely used my central air all summer. The only drawback is the size of the base I was looking for a smaller footprint. The base is the same for a circle base just with cutouts.
customer_reviews.author: Robin O.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: I like this for a while as it worked really well. I like the different settings, particularly the quieter ones while sleeping. But, those settings stopped working after a while and now we only have the highest two settings available. Tried multiple things to try and get the lower fan settings to work, but they won't. I'll end up having to buy another fan for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: We have been SO happy with this fan
customer_reviews.text: We have been SO happy with this fan. It was very simple to put together, and the pieces fit together well. When on the lower settings, it hardly makes any noise at all. We enjoy white noise, so as the higher settings sound more powerful it's perfect for us. The LED lighting doesn't bother us at all, though we do live in a city and are use to lights even as we sleep. The air flow is powerful. Highly recommend this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and was please how it worked. It put out a nice volume of air and was quiet. I was so impressed I bought two more. After a little more than a year (past the warranty of course) ALL THREE stopped working. If I pushed the blades manually they worked for a while before all three stopped working totally. Obviously there is "little" design flaw with these fans.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Blissfully Quiet Fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quiet pedestal fan and based on the product reviews, I chose this one. It came packed well with easy instructions. No tools needed. I assembled it in about 15 minutes. I love the remote control and 5 speeds too! Now it moves air very nicely in my rather small bedroom . I appreciate that it oscillates . And it it a quiet fan! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: D.Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quiet pedestal fan.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put near the foot of my bed to blow on me through the night. The remote control is a nice touch. I've been using it for months now and it is quiet, moves air, and has satisfied my needs. It feels sturdier and higher quality than some older cheapies I've gotten at Walmart and had to replace after a year or two. Only time will tell but I expect I'll get more than 2 years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one several weeks ago and fell in love. On calm, it is the quietest fan I've ever own. It does a great job of cooling, even at the lowest speed. There is a bit more noise at the higher speeds but since I rarely use those I was happy enough to buy a second one for the living room.This one is even quieter than the first one. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4 years. Now it’s dead.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this fan quit on me after about 4 years. I guess that’s considered good these days since most products aren’t built to last. But it’s getting hot and I’m sadly shopping for a new fan. I might be willing to spend a lot more to get one that will last. I hate the waste of throwing away something like this. My parents have fans that are older than I am. That said, while it worked, I really liked this fan. It was nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April 2017 and it worked great for the summer. Stored it for the winter in a spare room so it did not get dirt or damage. When we started using for 2018 (about a month ago) the motor was slow to start and sometimes would not, I woke a few nights ago to a noise coming from the fan and there was light smoke in the room. So to make this to the point it did not even last 2 years and I would not recommend buying even though it worked great when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nance

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in October 2017. Used only 1 summer and not even that much! Tried turning it on this winter for the white noise function and the fan doesn't work. The lights on the control panel work, fan doesn't spin. Hard to believe that you can't expect to have a fan work for more than a few months before having to put it in the land fill. Item title should be, "disposable fan".
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern girl

customer_reviews.title: that fan is awesome. I purchased another oscillating fan a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing that I can say about the fan is that it's not very powerful. I have another oscillating fan whereby the knob broke and having to turn it off and on with pliers has become undesirable; however, that fan is awesome. I purchased another oscillating fan a couple of month ago and took it on vacation with me. I must have tightened the telescoping arm too tight and the plastic piece snapped in half. So, after reading the reviews, I decided top purchase this, only to find out that the motor is really not powerful, even op all of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Hulk

customer_reviews.title: Puts all my other fans to shame!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this fan! All the fans I owned in the past (mostly box fans) sucked compared to this. This fan is actually better than my turbo wind fan I payed 70 bucks for. My only stickle with this is I wish i could oscillate with the remote but that's no biggie. The fan is pretty quiet but not too quiet. So if you like the white noise then you'll love this fan. And if you need air movement it's wonderful for that! I use it in my bedroom doorway to bring the cool air into the living room because we just have a window air conditioner in the bedroom and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Worked and then died
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for six months. When we got it out this summer it has been working about 50% of the time until it died this week. Bought it 14 months ago. Will try and get it replaced but clearly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan barely even a year ago, and it just quit working today. Very disappointing because it really is a great fan. We love the remote control, the sound the fan puts off isn't bad, and the different setting you can choose. I was so happy with it that we bought a second one within the first month. That one still works, but as this one and other reviewers noted, I'm sure it won't be long before that one stops working as well. Heed the warnings, pick a different fan if you want something that'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Someone should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.text: Outer box was fine. Inside everything was in a ball taped up like a mummy. Step 1 Base – screws were ill machined and didn't fit. Step 2 Rod – hard to assemble since the rod was missing. Obviously someone took a returned item and intentionally re-shipped it rather than having it repaired or junked. Shame on someone.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN P.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot sleep without it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan. It's my second one. I wore out the first one after about a year and a half. It is not too loud. I can still hear the TV in my bedroom over the fan. It produces a lot of cool air. The remote is nice. The only down side is that the display lights are bright. It's like a small blue night light.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh.
customer_reviews.text: Similar issue as most others. The CONS: The bright blue light is annoying at night. Another thing to note, while this fan may have 5 different speed options, I can only tell the difference between the highest and lowest settings, and even that isn't much of a difference of fan speed. PROS: The fan is quiet and easy to assemble. There is nice air circulation in a small room. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Shaky start but excellent recovery!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a problem with my first order - the box didn't contain the user manual, remote control, and several required assembly parts. However, just 2 days after informing Amazon about the problem, a brand-new box appeared on my doorstep this morning; excellent recovery! It took 15 minutes to assemble and appears to be exactly what I was looking for. The lowest setting (called "sleep") is super-quiet yet provides a decent airflow. The highest setting produces a really strong flow, and I plan to use this in conjunction with my window A/C unit on those blistering hot days. Overall, a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: nightwalker22

customer_reviews.title: Works for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this fan im Feb 2016! Now wont even turn on. Never blew strong, but it was for my bedroom so that didnt bother me. Not only does it not work now, but turns on and hums with no revolutions. NOT A GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Z

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan doesn't blow me away (pun intended), but I think it is a pretty good value. The assembly is easy, it's a nice looking fan (not cheap looking), and it works very well. Pros: Lots of different speeds/settings Good remote Quiet operation Easy assembly Cons: Even on high, not as strong as I would expect Note: Mine has some vibration noise, but it's not a deal-breaker. Also, it might be due to my poor assembly skills.
customer_reviews.author: WMassGuy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great stand up fan. Originally we were looking into tower fans but those typically do not produce as much wind power. This fan is great for the force it has and the fact that it is very, very quiet. We loved it so much we ended up buying a second one! We leave one fan on during the day oscillating to move air around the house and we turn the other one on at night in our room for air flow. There are 5 speed settings, also a turn-off timer at intervals of 1 hour, 2 hours, 4 hours, and 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: DovaKeen

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt have a long life!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so. I love this fan..I've bought 2..first one died after maybe a year..so I ordered another one and stopped working after 6 months..It would turn on but wouldnt spin so I would have to take off the cage and slip off the blade and mess with it to try and spin it myself to get it going -_- I settled w that for a few months cuz I'm accustomed to how it worked well when it did but its finally dead..so yeah great disposable fan.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Durability is Questionable.
customer_reviews.text: It died before the 2 year mark. Truly disappointing in how little it lasted. The fan itself was quiet, but changing the settings results in extremely loud beeps. The LED of the fan is always on so it's terrible for light sensitive sleepers. The remote died even earlier than the fan and stopped working about 7 months from purchase date. It was easy to assemble which is pretty much the only good thing about it. When brand new it was also very good at moving air, even after repeated cleanings age caught up to it and the fan was no longer as powerful as it originally came.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: A junk fan
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a Month of use and now I can't even return it. Turns on but won't run.
customer_reviews.author: howdyangel

customer_reviews.title: Anything but quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is anything but quiet. Anything level 2 or higher makes a ton of noise. Like the blade hits the wire cage on high speed and sounds like a motorcycle. I can really only use it on the lowest setting. Which isn’t high enough for what I need it for. So basically it’s pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Fan
customer_reviews.text: Over all very nice fan so I gave 5 stars. Only complaint is I wished the max speed moved a little more air. The fan runs really quiet and does have a wide range of speeds but with the smaller blade the lower speeds do not move much air at all. The remote works great and the built in timer settings are a neat feature. The LED indicators are a bit bright as mentioned in other reviews but don't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, but with a few annoying quirks
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good fan. It is stable, reasonably quiet, and the remote control feature is surprisingly useful. As others have noted, it has a small light which can be annoying if you use this while sleeping, but you can put a piece of tape over that. Also, it beeps when turning it off or on, which can be a bit of an issue if using it around people who are trying to sleep. But otherwise, I really like it, and will probably buy another one for use in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Snugs

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this. My busband needs a fan running at night, but noisy box fans kept me away. This fan is very quite even at its highest setting. It was easy to put together as well. The only thing that can be annoying is the l.e.d. light on the settings display. It is as bright as a nightlight. This can be fixed by placing tape or something over it that can be easily removed. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: This is a quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived without damage and looks better than is pictured. Works great and is very quiet which is exactly what I was looking for to cool my patio. The only problem I noticed is the front blade grate doesn't mount exactly right. I thought it might have been bent in transit but I don't think so as it was packaged very well so I chalk it up to a manufacturing error but its not that bad it still mounts ok but its just a little off from being flush. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: RonKar

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: I love how quiet this machine is even on the higher levels. I liked it so much I found it locally and bought another one from Target. It is definitely quieter than the Holmes 18" fan that I purchased from Amazon but the Holmes 18" one is good for the living room as it is more powerful which is needed to circulate a much larger room. I use the Honeywell 16" one near my couch so I can hear the TV and Holmes in the dining/kitchen area. With both they help cool the room a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, only drawbacks are there is no way ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, only drawbacks are there is no way to shut off the beeping of changing the fan speed, or dim the light display... both of which are problems if you need to adjust things while someone else is alseep in the room.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very quiet. It is quieter on the highest setting than my other fan was on the lowest setting. The black looks much better than my previous fan which was white. It was easy to assemble. The fan grill covers can be removed to clean the blades. The remote is very handy & functions well. Overall, I am very pleased with the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options with this fan and I love that it has a remote and a shut off timer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, everything about it, BUT I purchased one 18 months ago and it quit working after about 16 months. This time I bought the extended warranty and I have my fingers crossed that the old one just had a defect. I use the fan every single night so I did get my use out of it. The only con would be that it could stand a little taller. I have to put mine on a hatbox to raise it about 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Clark

customer_reviews.title: TV remote turns fan off/on
customer_reviews.text: I just got this fan less than a week ago and for the most part it's perfect. It has good airflow, a nice range of oscillation, is reasonably quiet and was easy to set up. The only issue I've encountered so far, and the only reason I didn't give it a 5th star, is that apparently the on/off frequency is the same as the volume up frequency of my Sony TV remote control. At first I thought thought there was something wrong causing it to turn on and off randomly. Then I realized it was the TV remote. Moving the fan a bit further 5th o the side has lessened the problem, though it still happens now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the quality of this fan. It is not as sturdy as I thought it would be. Many parts are plastic. I bought two, and one of them operates very quietly until you get to the highest speed. The other rattles even at lower speeds. The remote control is a nice touch. If you're looking for a fan to last for several years, this may not be your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Perri Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the money, buy a new one every year.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was great while it worked. Very quiet, multiple speeds, blended with the decor. It lasted almost a year. 11 months. We will most likely get another one but it is a shame it crapped out. Something in the motor. It would buzz when turned on and a spin of the fan blades got it to work. This required taking off the safety cage (5 clips...easy peasy)... just annoying. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Nalli

customer_reviews.title: Not good, not durable, not powerful
customer_reviews.text: Got it from Amazon on July 14, 2018. Didn't expect to be so slow. Anyway it lasted till November 28, 2018 when I decided to put it in the trash because nothing made it work. The motor fried or died. I don't recommend this fan to anyone. I bought this only because of the brand, but this was the worst fan I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very quiet. Nice metal grill. For the price and with the remote control, decent purchase. On the slowest setting barely audible. This a nice room fan. If it gets through two summers definitely worth the money. Blue light is in my opinion nothing like this "piercing light" other reviewer are talking about. It has a light that lets you know which setting and amount of hours on the timer. I find that helpful. will update if fan has any mechanical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: Premium fan, with some intermittent gremlins
customer_reviews.text: This is my my 2nd one. First one 2 years old and still in use. PRO’s: has 5 speeds - 2 lower speed options than many cheaper fans; has timer; has remote. CON’s: both fans make intermittent squeaking and other annoying noises - whether oscillating or not. Even when parts are lubricated and tighter properly; premium cost
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: too quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this because I've had stand fans that are unstable and the oscillation noises. This one is not like that at all. We have central air but we prefer fresh air. These do a great job circulating air and the different speeds are perfect. I ended up giving one to my mom and buying a third for us. I love the sleep setting for the noise and breeze now that the furnace is on. And the cats have not knocked it over yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Slack

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get a full year of use before it broke down
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the fan on 07/09/2017 and all the buttons just stopped working completely without notice in 05/2018. In 06/2018 it stopped working altogether and now I cannot use it at all. Worthless! I didn't even get a full year out of this fan. Unacceptable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shontae H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good fan. It is made in China and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fan. It is made in China and the product quality is average. You need to tighten everything well or you will have rattles and sounds... You may need a good pair of pliers for the fan screen... For the Price, I would expect this to be MADE in the USA and of better parts... The features are nice, four speeds and oscillation. Hopefully this will last. The in-service date is 10-06-2016...
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working American

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 years.  It’s junk!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware don’t buy this piece of garbage! Didn’t even last 2 years! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny &.

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan i assembled it in 5 minutes without any tools.It is the most quiet fan i have ever purchased, may buy another for the bedroom. However the fan was a " Prime " item with 2 day delivery put was turned over to the US Postal service so you get it when they feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Fan not worth your $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in September of 2017 so it is a little over 2 years old now, but it has stopped working completely. For the past six months, the blades would randomly stop spinning and I would either have to wait for them to start rotating on their own or turn it off and back on again. The light is on on the fan panel, but the blades refuse to spin. Good short term product but altogether not a reliable fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quite  and moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.text: I already had purchased one of these and it finally died. I purchased another one. It can be very quite on the lowest setting (5 different levels) and move a lot of air without being too loud on the high setting. I didn't think I would ever use a remote control for a fan but it is in my bedroom and is very convenient without have to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Garry P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small room
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived today and took about 30 minutes to set up. No tools required! I bought this to use in my bedroom and it’s perfect. The fan is at the foot of my bed, so I don’t need to use the highest setting, which obviously is very noisy. I set it to level 2 and the sound is bearable...sort of soothing for me. Three screws are included to secure the base to the ‘pole’. I think they’re called butterfly screws. The sides of the screws are a bit flimsy. I squeezed too hard on one of them while securing it and the sides squished into the middle. It still works, but just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: CeeYou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 black Honeywell fans and I LOVE them. Recieved all the parts for it and it was so easy to assemble, didn't even need to look at the directions. The fan is really quiet and can hardly hear it and the little blue light that people keep talking about really isn't that bright. I absolutely love these fans, even bought a smaller Honeywell before this arrived to have because my other fan I had before I could barely feel. Such a great brand and it arrived within a week, actually a day earlier than it was suppose to. I defiantly recommend this brand and this fan to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with a fan on every night, bought this fan about 16 months ago and the motor has died already. It also has a very bright blue light that indicated the settings which was bothersome for night time use. Over all not impressed with the product and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet, a really terrific fan with a so-so remote control
customer_reviews.text: The only reason is did not get all 5 stars is because of the remote control. For it to work, you need to be able to pointed directly at the fan when operating it remotely. But I'm paralyzed, and my hands don't work very well, so getting the remote control perfectly lined up is quite an undertaking for me. Other than that, I love it! It is the quietest band I've ever used. I have another, much older fan the same size, and it makes a racket when it's on.. Don't get me wrong, though – I love having a remote-controlled fan, especially in light of my extremely limited mobility.
customer_reviews.author: NICK DANGER

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months. It works well with no problems. It has a few speed selections. I am usually in the middle. I love that it has a remote. I wish i could use my phone to control it because i lose the remote sometimes and it is just another thing to keep track of. But, so far, so good. I am glad to have it because it helps me stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Good Pedestal Fan
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bedroom. The fan is quiet and is not too powerful like some other fans I’ve had. Some reviews mention the light, I don’t think it’s very bright and my bedroom is very dark. The one nuisance is the beeping from the fan when I use the fan remote. It is loud and wakes my spouse. But this is my favorite fan that I’ve owned to date.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas kruger

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative to the expensive Rowenta
customer_reviews.text: This fan is half the price of the Rowenta 16 inch. It works perfectly well. So for me, it wins on value. I've owned it for 8 months and use it for an average of 2 hours a day on low speed. It's still running with no problems. The remote control is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in CA

customer_reviews.title: I like these fans
customer_reviews.text: I like these fans. I had bought one previously for my sons room and made this purchase as a second one for myself. Love the remote, love the timer, love the different levels of circulation you can choose from. I know some reviews complain about the light from the fan but it doesn't bother my family at all.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Had for 2.5 yrs. Nice design, quiet and love a remote.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in Nov. 2014 it is now April 2017. It has worked perfectly until today, for awhile it only wanted to work on high, but after running awhile it seems fine again. I leave it on almost all day, every day. So overall I say good deal. I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this, with one minor complaint
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this item mostly because it is quiet, as advertised, and has the remote control which included a battery. I also like that it is a floor fan so that it does not take up table space. I like that it can be set to oscillate or not. I was discouraged enough at how much assembly was required, that I put off doing that assembly for 3 weeks after it arrived. It was one of the highest priced fans I looked at, so I feel that there should be less assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Pie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it till it died after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this fan 5 stars until this morning. I had the fan 2 years in July and this morning it just died. The lights come on but the fan doesnt work anymore. I have had fans for 10 years or more so 2 years isnt very long.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has a little bit of a squeak when running on lower speeds. Nothing WD40 doesn't fix. But man this thing works. Use it in my hot room all the time and it starts cooling instantly. Remote feature is way cool too, Promotes laziness but that's the American way I guess. Anyways I use it all the time when I'm at the computer or falling asleep. if you need to freshen your room get a spray freshener and spray the wings. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Henry

customer_reviews.title: This is a awesome fan. It's so quiet you don't even remember ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome fan. It's so quiet you don't even remember to turn it off. but I fixed that problem because it has a 2hr, 4hr, 8hr button you can hit so you don't have to remember to turn it off. it goes off automatically. the settings are perfect. the 'white noise' is great and the 'sleep' setting is just exactly the wind you need. we bought two fans to use outside for party but i tested them out inside and now i'm ordering two more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer P.

customer_reviews.title: but they very quickly replaced initial shipment missing base - good customer service
customer_reviews.text: It is a very quiet fan. Pole is a little flimsy due to heavier "virtual' control box, but that's okay as long as the fan is placed somewhere where no kids will run into it or anything. Would probably give a 4, but they very quickly replaced initial shipment missing base - good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Da Wave Kine

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this fan until recently when it decided to stop working. Turn it on and the motor does not work anymore, fan does not spin. Took it apart, put it back together, problem still occurring. Very disappointing for the price paid and it was a great fan before this happened. Has this happened to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a soft gentle breeze kissing your skin
customer_reviews.text: I never ever thought I would be so enthusiastic about a fan. Other fans I have purchased in the past just feel like an uncomfortable amount of air blowing on you and after a while I can't take it anymore and have to turn the fan off. This fan feels like a soft gentle breeze is kissing your skin. I often lay in front of this fan and take a super relaxing nap.
customer_reviews.author: bwings

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this! It’s a piece of junk! You need a mechanical engineering degree to put it together. I had to tape the base of mine to make the screws that hold it up stay in place. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LD400RN

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan!! 3 years and counting....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for 3 years and run it continuously through the night, every night. Never a problem-dependable and quiet! I’m getting ready to order my third one so I have one for my living room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Of course this was the final step in assembly so a big waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The front grill would not line up with back grill and snap on. After my husband and I struggled with this, we finally gave up and returned the fan. It's as if the front was smaller around than the back grill. Of course this was the final step in assembly so a big waste of time. Then we had to try and repackage all the parts and get it back into box. Not a happy experience.
customer_reviews.author: Barbilee

customer_reviews.title: Cool Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my third fan in this series (use in different rooms) as a way to keep a/c bills lower in Texas. They are whisper quiet, and the remote control is super easy to use. What I really like is I received one with a missing back cover to the remote, and one quick e mail and they rushed me a new remote; which was really good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ken the Teacher

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet but still junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. The first was used which was DOA. The second one works great with no problems. The third worked for 6 months before dying. Seriously....how does something that just spins in a circle break so easily????
customer_reviews.author: RobTheGamer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan until it breaks. This is the 2nd fan I've had of this brand, love it until the blades don't spin anymore. I've disassembled it, lubed it then it works for 1 month then repeat. >:o( It says it has a 1 year warranty but I have no idea how to file a claim. Any tips. Please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: * exactly 1 year old, fan stand split in half and fan flew off stand. 😟 This is the best fan I've ever purchased wish I bought it two months ago. Very quiet and a low setting gives that extra boost of cool needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan and own 2 of them. I bought this one for my elderly mother. It comes with a remote so it is nice for her to be able to control it from across the room. It is quiet and puts out a good amount of wind!
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCall

customer_reviews.title: Very quite fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 6 of these fans in the past and will order 2 more today. I love that I can have them running and not have the sound bother me.
customer_reviews.author: ROBaUSA

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and very queiet - just rocks a bit when in 'swing' mode.
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet and light and functions fine, except when the swinging action is turned on. It then rocks because it is not weighted properly - nothing dangerous, but a bit unsettling. Tried to add a weight at the bottom but it turns out that the connector rods are not snug enough so it rocks regardless. Not sure if this is because the piece is 'defective' or because it was sent out to us as a pre-used/pre-opened item (was supposed to be new).
customer_reviews.author: Pre Poster Us

customer_reviews.title: it's actually very nice to be able to turn it on and off ...
customer_reviews.text: This is much quieter than the stand fan we had before it in the TV room. The blue light doesn't bother us, and though we wouldn't have thought a remote control was necessary for a fan, it's actually very nice to be able to turn it on and off and adjust from your seat. I haven't had it long so hope it lasts longer than some reviews indicated, but did buy an extended warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Miss KAT

customer_reviews.title: Quiet it is!
customer_reviews.text: I can't sleep without a fan humming, but I don't want it to sound like a jet turbine, this fan is great because it gives me the white noise I like at night, my room is small so when I watch tv the fan blows right next to me, it's hot in AZ so turning off the fan is a NO this one I just put on the sleep level and I'm still cool and I can hear, wish that it was a bit bigger as the temps reach 110+ out here and our A/C is not so good and we can't afford to fix it, a larger fan would provide a bit more cooling, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: MangoBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Give it time to break in and then it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: The fan when first used has a strong rubber smell. Let it air out for a few days running the fan in a well ventilated area and the smell will go away after a few days. The fan has an excellent sleep mode speed. Not too slow nor not to fast. The fan looks visually excellent. Looks like a high quality fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbydigital

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet but....
customer_reviews.text: Just got the fan today. It's quiet, that's the only thing I like about it. It doesn't adjust up, only straight at you or down which is what most folks want...I need it to go up another click or two to distribute heat during the winter. Two of the clips were bent and won't clamp down on the grill, which I can try to fix or use zip ties instead. For the hefty price I expected better construction and more adjustment. Still trying to decide if it's worth the effort to tear apart, box up, and return.
customer_reviews.author: ARandleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: I like the timer feature--you can choose 1, 2, 4 or 6 hour operation. Very quiet. The very best thing about it is the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Biblio woman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with how the fan holds up under almost continuous ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this running in my office during hot Summer months to help keep things cooler. Very pleased with how the fan holds up under almost continuous use, but really, really like how quiet it is. Slowest and one-up settings are the only two I have used, but have conference calls about 5ft away and no complaints on noise. Remote is a great feature, can change settings from my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This fan is excellent. The remote is the best feature
customer_reviews.text: This fan is excellent. The remote is the best feature. I have owned 4 of them and will continue to buy this model as long as they make it. If it were just a little better built, it would work for more than three or four years.
customer_reviews.author: zeplin

customer_reviews.title: Fan is quiet blue light won't work in a bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Fan is quiet blue light won't work in a bedroom. I bought last year and it quit working well a month ago. It still turns on but it takes it about 3 minutes to actually start working. Going in the trash as this is a hazard. I have another older Honeywell that has run for years. And I live in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: judy szpak

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy motor burns out in 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell HS-1655 QuietSet 16" Stand Fan - Black motor burns out in less than a year . Terrible product
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: this fan worked wonderfully until almost one year later
customer_reviews.text: this fan worked wonderfully until almost one year later...bought it june 20 2016 ...sending it to pasture may 28 2017 it worked nearly 24/7 on sleep mode for nearly a year....and then it just quits when it wants too.... it was wonderfully quiet...and worked nicely with its remote.i would have liked it to have a longer life....rather than have to be shopping for another one... :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet, love the Remote Control
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. When central A/C is on, it is louder than the fan. My wife has sleeping issues and low volume TV sound helps her sleep. turn this fan on, which i need to keep cool, and she does not need to adjust volume it is so quiet. Also, very easy set up which did not require me to look at instructions. The remote control is a nice feature. Never had a fan with an RC and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Worfsdad

customer_reviews.title: True to it's name - great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! It's very quiet and works well. It comes with a remote so you don't have to get up to change the setting when the fan is across the room. We now have 3 of these fans and they have saved us going through the heat waves without air conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: not as quiet as they say
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be quiet, but when you press the buttons to change the speed the fan makes an extrememly loud beeping sound. Operating this fan for a couple weeks and it has started to get the standard sound of the blades rattling / rubbing that you find on all low end fans.
customer_reviews.author: amorris

customer_reviews.title: Quality & quiet make this a terrific fan
customer_reviews.text: After buying the first two, I was sold. The remote is great and allows me to change fan speeds easily in the middle of the night without getting. The 5-speed options, timer functions, durability, & quiet fan make this a quality fan at a reasonable price. I liked it so much I ordered 2 more recently to replace my other old & clunky fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. I’ve had it for a few months and it works great; it’s not too noisy and you can chose different levels of setting for intensity. The remote is an added bonus and it also has a timer. It took 5 minutes to assemble and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but anything plastic squeaks and vibrates
customer_reviews.text: Has all the bells and whistles you would want, but not as quiet as we would like. It has an annoying click every time it changes directions, and if you set it not to oscillate you can softly hear it hum when it internally try's to move. I remember many years ago when they used to make these out of metal instead of plastic and they were solid...
customer_reviews.author: John Macy

customer_reviews.title: good basic fan
customer_reviews.text: great basic fan. i loved the remote, til my son lost it. anyway, it's got good airflow. the only thing is, it's kinda loud. the "sleep" function is actually really loud. if we have it on at night it has to be turned to the highest setting that seems to be the quietest. the blue lights on the buttons are almost too bright.
customer_reviews.author: NellieR

customer_reviews.title: Used daily with no issues. A keeper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on sale, Summer 2015. Used daily since, with no issues. Enough settings to get a breeze dialed in to taste, while I'm working. Can be pretty quiet. Some days, it's been on for 20 hours. I'm pretty impressed that a consumer item has held up this well. Oh... I chose to mask the bright blue Speed Setting LEDs. Did I mention that they're bright?
customer_reviews.author: just-us

customer_reviews.title: A relationship that ended too soon
customer_reviews.text: The fan was a little difficult to put together, but my wife and I managed to do it. Once we got the fan working, I loved it. It looked nice, it was quiet, and it ran great. Then, this past Sunday, it just stopped. Pretty much exactly four months after I bought it and right in the middle of a hot DC summer. This appears to be a major malfunction and I don't feel it's worth sending the fan back to the manufacturer for repairs. I will take a look at some other stand fans and purchase a different brand so I can keep cool.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lund

product_meta.title: Honeywell HS-1655 QuietSet 16" Stand Fan - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHoneywell QuietSet 16" Stand Fan w/LED Controls & Remote Control.
feature_bullets: 5 Speeds/Levels of Quiet Control including "White Noise"
Please Note: Kindly refer the User Manual before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars2,046 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 2 Aaa Batteries, Honeywell Quietset 16" Stand Fan, Remote, Owner's Manual
